title: ICE - 'cannot access a scoped thread local variable without calling `set` first'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Hello,

After updating nightly version to `2019-07-31` (also fails on `2019-08-04`), previously working code no longer compiles.
I can confirm that it compiles successfully on `nightly-2019-07-30`.

EDIT: Happens on `debug` aswell, also doesn't happen on macOS, but I'm not sure whether it's a transitive dependency or a windows specific thing.
